children.text: By accessing the MileagePlus® X application ("MileagePlus X"), by making transactions through MileagePlus X, by accepting or using any Gift Card (as defined below) purchased through MileagePlus X or specifically by clicking a checkbox for "I agree" or similar statements, in each case, you expressly indicate to United Airlines, Inc., MileagePlus Holdings, LLC and their respective subsidiaries, affiliates and agents (together, "United", "we", "us" or "our") your acknowledgment and acceptance of these MileagePlus X Terms and Conditions and the MileagePlus Program Rules, which are expressly incorporated herein. United, in its sole discretion, may revise these MileagePlus X Terms and Conditions at any time or make changes to MileagePlus X at any time, with or without notice, and your subsequent accessing of MileagePlus X, making transactions through MileagePlus X, accepting or using any Gift Card (as defined below) purchased through MileagePlus X or clicking a checkbox for "I agree" or similar statements, in each case, will serve as your acknowledgement and acceptance of such changes. These MileagePlus X Terms and Conditions control your use of and participation with MileagePlus X and no covenants at law or in equity shall be implied or incorporated. United has the sole right to interpret and apply all terms and conditions as it sees fit.

MileagePlus X is available only to MileagePlus members physically located in the 50 United States or the District of Columbia. You may have only one MileagePlus X account at a time. Any offer for any products or services made in or through MileagePlus X is void where prohibited.
